channel.title: Sick Food on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Sick Food on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: sick
item.description: i am sick. I stayed home today. the first time in quite awhile. I just was tired of waking up and feeling like hell. so I decided that rather than prolong the my cold I woudl just stay home. and sleep. I didn’t mean to sleep. but I slept. until 2. haha. rule. i just ate lunch. food rules.
